headline: Why Verizon’s Surprise CEO Change Rattled the Wireless Industry
summary: Verizon’s  unexpected CEO transition is shaking up wireless stocks, and likely signaling increased competition ahead, Wall Street analysts warn.  Verizon appointed lead independent director Daniel Schulman as its new CEO on Monday, effective immediately.  With this new transition, Verizon will focus on maximizing value propositions, reducing costs, and delivering sustainable long-term growth for shareholders, according to Monday’s news release.

headline: AT&T and Boldyn Networks bring cellular service to the MTA's Joralemon Street tunnel, with expanded G line connectivity next
summary: AT&T, in collaboration with Boldyn Networks (Boldyn), expanded cellular connectivity in New York City's Joralemon Street tunnel, with crosstown G line segments next, providing early momentum for what will be one of the most important wireless upgrades to Brooklyn's transit system in years. Connectivity is live on-air for AT&T riders in the Joralemon Street tunnel, with connectivity on the G line to follow.
